ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: EBGU - Udvidelse af intelligent måling for Elektro Bijeljina
EBWE - Elektro Bijeljina Smart Metering Erweiterung
EBRD - Elektro Bijeljina smart metering expansion
BERD - Expansión de los contadores inteligentes de Elektro Bijeljina
EBRD - Elektro Bijeljinan älykkään mittausjärjestelmän laajennus
BERD - Déploiement de compteurs intelligents de Elektro Bijeljina
ΕΤΑΑ - Επέκταση του συστήματος έξυπνης μέτρησης της Elektro Bijeljina
BERS - Espansione della misurazione intelligente di Elektro Bijeljina
EBWO - Uitbreiding van het aantal slimme elektriciteitsmeters in Bijeljina
BERD - Expansão em matéria de medição inteligente na Elektro Bijeljina
EBRD - Elektro Bijeljina smart metering expansion
EBOR - Rozšíření inteligentních měřičů Elektro Bijeljina

EBRD - Az Elektro Bijeljina intelligens mérőberendezések bővítése
ERPB - „Elektro Bijeljina“ pažangiųjų apskaitos sistemų plėtra
ERAB - Uzņēmuma Elektro Bijeljina viedo uzskaites mēraparātu ieviešanas paplašināšana
BERŻ - Espansjoni tal-kejl intelliġenti Elektro Bijeljina
EBOR - rozbudowa inteligentnego systemu pomiarowego Elektro Bijeljina
EBOR - Rozšírenie používania inteligentných meračov spoločnosti Elektro Bijeljina
EBOR - Širitev pametnega merjenja za podjetje Elektro Bijeljina
EBRD - Formhéadú an mhéadraithe chliste Elektro Bijeljina
ЕБВР - Разширение на системата за интелигентно отчитане Електро Биелина
BERD - Extinderea contorizării inteligente de către Elektro Bijeljina
EBRD - Proširenje pametnog mjerenja u Elektro Bijeljini

TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Udvidelse af intelligent måling for Elektro Bijeljina (BA-Bijeljina)

CONTENTS.P: Project name: Elektro Bijeljina smart metering expansion
Country: Bosnia and Herzegovina
Business sector: Power and Energy
Project ID: 8943-GPN-49203
Funding source: EBRD loan proceeds
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General Procurement Notice
Issue date: 22.1.2018.
Closing date: 22.1.2019.

The ZEDP Elektro Bijeljina A.D. Bijeljina (“Elektro Bijeljina” or the “Company”) is the state owned power distribution company in Republika Srpska - Bosnia and Herzegovina. The company has applied for a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) finance the reconstruction of medium and low-voltage power distribution networks as well as the installation of smart meters. The intention is to also make the use of a concessional tranche provided by the Green Energy Special Fund (“GESF”), which is a Special Fund established and administrated by the Bank with the contribution of the Taiwanese International Cooperation and Development Fund (Taiwan ICDF) to support EBRD projects related to investments in efficient energy technologies (also known as “green”).
The proposed project has a total estimated cost up to 15 000 000 EUR, and will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services for:
— reconstruction of medium and low-voltage networks,
— extension of smart metering in the region covered by the company.
Tendering is expected to commence by mid-2018

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the Bank will be subject to the Bank's Procurement Policies and rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the Bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

TI_DOC.P: EBWE - Elektro Bijeljina Smart Metering Erweiterung (BA-Bijeljina)

TI_DOC.P: ERPB - „Elektro Bijeljina“ pažangiųjų apskaitos sistemų plėtra (BA-Bijeljina)

CONTENTS.P: Project name: Elektro Bijeljina smart metering expansion
Country: Bosnia and Herzegovina
Business sector: Power and Energy
Project ID: 8943-GPN-49203
Funding source: EBRD loan proceeds
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General Procurement Notice
Issue date: 22.1.2018.
Closing date: 22.1.2019.

The ZEDP Elektro Bijeljina A.D. Bijeljina (“Elektro Bijeljina” or the “Company”) is the state owned power distribution company in Republika Srpska - Bosnia and Herzegovina. The company has applied for a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) finance the reconstruction of medium and low-voltage power distribution networks as well as the installation of smart meters. The intention is to also make the use of a concessional tranche provided by the Green Energy Special Fund (“GESF”), which is a Special Fund established and administrated by the Bank with the contribution of the Taiwanese International Cooperation and Development Fund (Taiwan ICDF) to support EBRD projects related to investments in efficient energy technologies (also known as “green”).
The proposed project has a total estimated cost up to 15 000 000 EUR, and will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services for:
— reconstruction of medium and low-voltage networks,
— extension of smart metering in the region covered by the company.
Tendering is expected to commence by mid-2018

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the Bank will be subject to the Bank's Procurement Policies and rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the Bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

TI_DOC.P: ERAB - Uzņēmuma Elektro Bijeljina viedo uzskaites mēraparātu ieviešanas paplašināšana (BA-Bijeljina)
